alert.note: Alert for Meigs (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 4:19PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Meigs, Wirt, northwestern Roane, northeastern Jackson and southwestern Wood Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 418 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Forked Run State Park, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Elizabeth, Forked Run State Park, Reedy, Portland, Lucille, Peewee, Belleville, Reedsville, Morristown, Rockport and Palestine. This includes Interstate 77 in West Virginia between mile markers 149 and 167. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for central West Virginia.
